name: Tangie Dream
description: Citrus explosion. A lucid dreaming fuel that tastes like fresh tangerines. Perfect for creative flow.

name: Wifi
description: High speed connection to the cosmos. 5G for your brain. White Fire OG genetics that cut through the noise.

name: Sour Diesel
description: Fuel for the engine. Gas, loud, and uncompromising. The East Coast legend returns.

name: Blueberry Cupcake
description: Sweet, baked goodness. Dessert first. A frost-covered treat that smells exactly like its name.

name: White Russian
description: Strong medicine. A creamy knockout punch from the 90s. While Widow x AK-47.

name: Peanut Butter
description: Nutty, earthy, smooth. Sticks to the roof of your mind. Deep relaxation pending.

name: Ice Cream Cake
description: Sugary frost for the soul. Creamy vanilla notes with a heavy body dispersion.

name: Cheese
description: Old school funk. Deeply savory and relaxing. The classic master.
